channel.title: Return statuses on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Return statuses on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: BO - Shop Parameters - Order Statuses - Create a new order return status
item.description: BO - Shop Parameters - Order Statuses - Create a new order return status Steps Step Description Expected result Go to BO > Shop Parameters > Order Settings > Tab Statuses Page titles contains “Statuses” Click on the “Add new order return status” Page title contains “Return status” Fill all fields > Save Message Successful creation is displayed Newly created return status is displayed in Return statuses block
